resources.name: Assetronics API
resources.description: Complete API collection for Assetronics asset management system

resources.name: Login (Admin)
resources.description: Login with admin credentials. Returns access_token and refresh_token.

resources.name: Register New User
resources.description: Register a new user account. Sends welcome and verification emails.

resources.name: Refresh Token
resources.description: Get a new access token using refresh token

resources.name: Confirm Password Reset
resources.description: Reset password with token from email

resources.name: Verify Email
resources.description: Verify email address with token from email

resources.name: List Users
resources.description: List all users with optional filtering

resources.name: Unlock User Account
resources.description: Unlock a locked user account (admin only)

resources.name: List Assets
resources.description: List all assets with optional filtering

resources.name: Search Assets
resources.description: Search assets by name, tag, or serial number

resources.name: Get Employee Assets
resources.description: Get all assets assigned to employee

resources.name: Start Workflow Execution
resources.description: Start a new workflow execution from template

resources.name: Advance Workflow Step
resources.description: Mark current step complete and advance to next

resources.name: Upload File
resources.description: Upload a file (multipart/form-data). Include 'file' field and optional 'category' field.

resources.name: Upload User Avatar
resources.description: Upload avatar for user (max 5MB, images only)

resources.name: Upload Asset Photo
resources.description: Upload photo for asset (max 10MB, images only)

resources.name: Upload Workflow Attachment
resources.description: Upload attachment for workflow (max 50MB, all file types)

resources.name: Health Check
resources.description: API health check endpoint (no authentication required)
